manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Specification Series Standard Desktop Memory Ram Type DDR4 Non ECC Unbuffered U-DIMM Capacity 8GB Frequency(Speed) 3200MHz CL 22 Campatibility Compatible with all major motherboards with Low voltage consumption. Operate at JEDEC standard 1.2V IC Quality Using Hynix IC brings your system high quality and immediate improvement. Easy Installation Plug and Boost. No extra Technical skills required. Memory Module Dimension(mm) 133(L) x 2.5 (W) x 31(H)

Instant upgrade for your system Whether you're working with photos, videos, or other programs, v-color offers you seamless performance during your most resource-intensive work. Install with ease Simply seat the RAM in the slot, toggle the plastic retention levers to lock your new memory modules in place. Please make sure Ram is placed in slot correctly and you can remove dust from the memory slots, either by blasting the area with compressed air or by vacuuming gently as well to avoid some performance degradation. v-color- Trustworthy Quality Each IC has been selected under rigorous testing techniques with auto sorting equipment designed by v-color. From sorting IC to Module manufacturing, every v-color product go through meticulous quality control to ensure the Stability and Durability.
SYSTEM OPTIMIZATION QVL approved by mainstream motherboard manufacturers.Achieve immediate improvement of system performance.Perfect compliance with the specifications of JEDEC

v-color Technology Inc. As one of the leading manufacturer of DRAM memory module, we are committed to become the best global memory solution provider. We manufacture the highest quality and the most extraordinary performance products, strictly tested with our unique auto-sorting equipment in our v-color facility, to offer all users with the best performance benefit. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks and works like a top quality product
reviews.reviewText: Installed this in my Dell XPS 8930 desktop. Much cheaper than buying with the computer, and cheaper than ordering from manufacturer. An easy install (just be sure the RAM sticks are fully seated.) Less expensive than the name brands, even those sold in pairs. Looks like a quality product when you receive it (packaged in a nice plastic sleeve) and the sticks themselves look like quality. The system saw the additional RAM immediately. Don't hesitate. Save yourself some money and enjoy the extra memory.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars At this price, this will be a waste of time....or so I thought.
reviews.reviewText: Bought two of the V-Color 8GB (1 x 8GB) DDR4 DRAM 2666MHz (PC4-21300) CL19 1.2V U-DIMM Desktop Memory (TD48G26S819-VC) for a total of 16G and $58.44 shipped to my door step.V-Color is a nice refreshing change over components of late with names like Xtreem PulverizzzEr RGB Octane 2000 ROG or some silly nonsense. Didn't have to pay extra for a heatsink that sinks no heat nor pay extra for flashy blinky lights that increase the price, but provide no real value.Back to the RAM, I plugged them into my MSI Performance Gaming AMD X470 Plus with a Ryzen 5 2600x along side some Corsair Vengeance LPX 16GB (2x8GB) DDR4 DRAM 3000MHz C15 RAM.Booted right to the BIOS, and set speed to 3000. Rebooted without issue and continues to work fine.I can't speak to the long term durability of these bad boys, but 16G for $58.44 righto my doorstep is a tad bit unreal. But, is very real.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible value for a new budget gaming PC
reviews.reviewText: I’m running this with a core i5-9600k and I have 2 DIMMs matching everything perfectly in dual channel mode. No tinkering necessary. They don’t ever get hot, so the heat sink isn’t really something to worry about. The max temps I’ve gotten are around 27° C but my case runs hot. Excellent value for the money. Reads the correct capacity and clock speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: I honestly thought it wasn't going to operate properly since I was looking for a quick and cheap fix for my pc. Yet, it performed up to par and honestly I'm happy about my purchase. It has my computer operating at a decent level. Making working from home that much easier. No real slow down while processing calls and exploring the web while having multiple programs and windows open.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working as expected!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these pair of DDR4 a couple of years ago and I haven't had any issue

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 8GB on the cheap
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to take my PC upto 16GB - incredibly easy to install, fit it and forget it. PC recognised it immediately, now have dual channel 16GB. Amazing value for money too - will definitely buty again from this seller!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works without issues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the money
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about it for the price but damn I’ve had no issues plugged right in and worked instantly as it should not recognized as a “RAM” for OC but if you’re not into that it’s perfect
